TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DisconnectedEventHandler(object sender, DisconnectedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DisconnectedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DisconnectedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DisconnectedEventArgs)
type DisconnectedEventHandler = delegate of obj * DisconnectedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: The source of the disconnection event.
